creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: procession led by four men in short, light blue garments carrying large boxes on backs, and tall poles with white puffs at top; followed by men in green coats with yellow hats; procession is heading toward viewer over large yellow bridge; village rooftops in background; two dogs at LR; group of men carrying baskets over shoulder walks away from bridge at LL
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscriptions, and Seals

URC,  signature LRQ (?) in Japanese; URQ, in Japanese
title: Nihonbashi, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
